resources.string: Rick Jones has been Hulk\'s best bud since day one, but now he\'s more than a friendâ€¦he\'s a teammate! Transformed by a Gamma energy explosion, A-Bomb\'s thick, armored skin is just as strong and powerful as it is blue. And when he curls into action, he uses it like a giant bowling ball of destruction!
